Package adept.serialization

Provides interfaces and classes for ADEPT data (de)serialization in XML, JSON and Binary format

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ISerializer Interface that supports methods for serialization.
 

Class Summary
AbstractSerializer Abstract class for serialization that enforces a srialization type to be specified.
BinaryFromJSONSerializer The Class BinaryFromJSONSerializer.
JSONSerializer JSON serializer.
XMLSerializer Performs XML serialization.
XmlToAnnotation The Class XmlToAnnotation.
 

Enum Summary
SerializationType The Enum SerializationType.
 

Package adept.serialization Description

Provides interfaces and classes for ADEPT data (de)serialization in XML, JSON and Binary format
